title: Cloud Computing Cohort Member
company: Bangkit Academy 2023 Batch 1 (Kampus Merdeka - Studi Independent)
description: Participated in a six-month online learning program focused on Cloud Computing. Collaborated in a final team project with six members across cloud computing, machine learning, and mobile development roles. Contributed to the development of the 'e-Laborate' application as a cloud developer.

title: Intern - Diaphragm Department
description: Performed tasks such as cutting diaphragm leaves to meet daily targets, sanding and cutting bobbins, and attaching eyelets to packing. Assisted in machine maintenance and repairs to ensure proper functionality and efficiency in the diaphragm production process.
